scripts.build: parcel build src/index.ts --out-file sdk-qilin.js && cp dist/sdk-qilin.js examples/simple/ && cp dist/sdk-qilin.js examples/qilinAdapter/ && cp dist/sdk-qilin.js examples/gamenetAdapter/ && cp dist/sdk-qilin.js examples/ramblerAdapter/
scripts.build:adapter: parcel build adapter/index.ts --out-file qilin-store-adapter.js && cp dist/qilin-store-adapter.js examples/qilinAdapter/ && cp dist/qilin-store-adapter.js examples/ramblerAdapter/ && cp dist/qilin-store-adapter.js examples/gamenetAdapter/
scripts.build:adapter:gamenet: parcel build gamenet-adapter/index.ts --out-file gamenet-adapter.js && cp dist/gamenet-adapter.js examples/gamenetAdapter/
scripts.build:adapter:rambler: parcel build rambler-adapter/index.ts --out-file rambler-adapter.js && cp dist/rambler-adapter.js examples/ramblerAdapter/
